title: Green processing via surface diffuse atmospheric plasma to enhance the dyeing performance on polylactic acid fabric
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,18073-18079
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02297A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Linfeng Yang, Junhan Sun, Zengyi He, Dezhao Hao, Yaping Feng, Haoyu Dai, Lei Jiang
A green, efficient, and continuous method to modify polylactic acid fiber with functional groups via surface diffuse atmospheric plasma for the improvement of hydrophilicity and dyeing performance, including color strength and fastness, is reported.
